org.jivesoftware.openfire.mediaproxy
Interface DatagramListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicAddressChannel, MediaProxySession, RelaySession
public interface DatagramListener

Listener for datagram packets received.

Author:
Thiago Camargo

Method Summary
 boolean datagramReceived(DatagramPacket datagramPacket)
          Called when a datagram is received.
 

Method Detail

datagramReceived

boolean datagramReceived(DatagramPacket datagramPacket)
Called when a datagram is received. If the method returns false, the packet MUST NOT be resent from the received Channel.

Parameters:
datagramPacket - the datagram packet received.
Returns:
?
